item.title: To correct maps depicting Unit T-10 of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make any corrections to the map subtitled "Four Mile Hill Unit TX-16P, North Padre Island Unit T10/T10P" (one in a set of maps of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System) that are necessary to ensure that it is consistent with the map entitled "Corrections to Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Unit T-10", dated June_____, 2004.

bill.title: A bill to provide for the correction of a certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map.

item.title: A bill to provide for the correction of a certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map.
A bill to provide for the correction of a certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map.

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
